# “Don’t buy if you want safety” — Musk issues a blunt warning about Tesla Roadster’s most hyped feature

by [Sarah I.](https://www.ecoportal.net/en/author/sarah-i/)

[January 30, 2026](https://www.ecoportal.net/en/dont-buy-if-you-want-safety-musk-issues/16751/)

in [Mobility](https://www.ecoportal.net/en/mobility/)

![Musk](https://www.ecoportal.net/en/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/5.-The-Pulse-Don-t-buy-if-you-want-safety-%E2%80%94-Musk-issues-a-blunt-warning-about-Tesla-Roadster-s-most-hyped-feature-750x422.jpg)

Credits: Mario Canino

**Tesla CEO Elon Musk has just issued a warning** to drivers about this vehicle model. Tesla has long been a pioneering electric vehicle company, pushing boundaries of battery engine technology and catapulting the electric vehicle industry to where it is today.
